review_list.title: Lovely Feel
review_list.text: The cot sheet has a beautiful feel and is a great fit. I highly recommended these.

review_list.title: Great cot sheet
review_list.text: The cot sheet is soft and being organic makes it safer for babies to sleep on.

review_list.title: Cot sheets
review_list.text: Always great to purchase from Bhumi

review_list.title: So soft!
review_list.text: Beautiful, soft cot sheets for my baby who has eczema. Impressed with the fast shipping as well.

review_list.title: Good value sheet
review_list.text: Really soft and comfortable sheet. No piling. Will buy again.

review_list.title: Only the best for bub :)
review_list.text: I love my Bhumi sheets- they're a beautiful quality, and I feel reassured knowing my baby is sleeping in the organic best!

review_list.title: Cotton sheet or dog bed sheet
review_list.text: I use these to cover my dog beds & keep them cool & today they are fantastic

review_list.title: High quality sheet
review_list.text: Lovely soft sheet that fits a standard cot mattress well.

review_list.title: Love this organic sheet !
review_list.text: The softest organic cotton sheet! I don’t want to buy any other brand !

review_list.title: Beautiful cot sheets, love knowing
review_list.text: Beautiful cot sheets, love knowing our bub is sleeping on quality without all the nasties.

review_list.title: Feels so soft and luxurious
review_list.text: This feels so luxurious and soft ready for our little one’s arrival. Feel good knowing our baby will be sleeping on a soft non toxic sheet.

review_list.title: Adorable cot sheet - love it!
review_list.text: Sooo soft and the most adorable unisex print - its so nice to really love the things you get for bubs :).

review_list.title: Absolutely Delightful!!
review_list.text: These cot sheets are absolutely divine!! My little man is a month old and already sleeping for 4hrs at a time - I think these super soft and deluxe sheets have something to do with him sleeping so deeply!! Thank you bhumi!! We are so grateful for your beautiful products!!
